attributes.action: Give us the rights to govern our own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you have read this please dont hesitate to sign,if you feel something is not right in this Country please do something! sign "now" then at least we can begin to agree that if "our" GOVERNMENT continues to give up all that is GREAT in our country to be told how to live by another governing body then we will cease to be GREAT.I dont know about you but i think its time for "US", as the GREAT NATION we really are to stop this craziness "NOW"  (and if you think this country is going down hill you are RIGHT and this is a "direct" result of being dictated to by another group that wants to control us!and it will get much worse if we dont stop this)Tell everyone you know NOW!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
